Save a single CSV-table into a single table sqlite database

datools

datools: A set of useful tools for machine learning consulting using R.

Find the relationship between the variables in a data set and plot them

Find the relationship between the variables in a data set and fit that model

genHolidays()

Generate public holidays for all markets

Create a Grammian Angular Field representation of a time series

Lag variables in data nlags

naToVal()

Replace NA with a user given value in a vector

naToZero()

Replace NA with 0 in a vector

nonFinToVal()

Replace non finite values with a user given value in a vector
